mixed-citation.article-title: Revision of the genus Miridiba Reitter, 1902 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Melolonthinae): genital morphotypes and new taxonomic data

tp:treatment-sec.p: Miridiba bannaensis Gao & Fang in Gao et al ., 2018: 2 , figs 1, 6 ( type loc.: Xishuangbanna, Yunnan , China ).
Miridiba bannaensis – Gao et al . 2019: 461 (species list; in key).

Gao et al . (2018) described Miridiba bannaensis based on one male holotype and three paratypes ( one male and two females ) preserved in IZCAS. The antenna 9-segmented, pronotal surface densely punctate and parameres with two dorsal and two ventral branches ( Gao et al . 2018 : fig. 1) allow us to include M. bannaensis in genital morphotype I “ Trichophora ”.
